title: Excelente producto
comment: El envio llego rapidisimo, pero el empaque estaba roto. Igual funciona perfecto!

title: Regular
comment: Lo use dos semanas y ya empezo a fallar :( la bateria se descarga muy rapido.

title: Buena compra
comment: Me gusto, aunque las instruciones vienen solo en ingles y con muchas abreviaturas.

title: Mala calidad
comment: No sirvio, venia sucio y parecia reusado. Ademas tardo un monton el envio.

title: Decepcion
comment: La pantalla tenia un pixel muerto y el vendedor no responde. No lo recomendaria.

title: Me encanto
comment: Pequeno pero potente, el sonido es clarito. Lo compre en promo y valio la pena.

title: Cumple
comment: La camara es buena, pero el estabilizador no es tan wow como dicen en los reviews.

title: Esperaba mas
comment: La caja llego golpeada y el cable fue distinto al de la foto. Igual funciona ok.

title: Rapido
comment: Entrega antes de tiempo, todo bn empacado. Lo uso diario y cero problemas.

title: No funciono
comment: Traia olor raro, y al segundo dia ya no encendio. Pedi devolucon.

title: Works great
comment: Setup was super easy, conects fast and the battery lasts forever, love it!

title: Solid choice
comment: Good value for $$, only downside is the plastick feel but performance is fine.

title: Disappointed
comment: Item arrived with scrathes and missing cable, customer suport was slooow.

title: Terrible
comment: Stopped working after 3 days. Tried rebooting several times, nothing. Waste of money.

title: Just ok
comment: Sound is decent but mic picks up too much noise. Manual has typos all over.

title: Nice gadget
comment: Lightweight, fits in my bag. App had a bug but update fixed it. Reccomend.

title: Not as pictured
comment: Color was completly different, and box looked openned. Returning it.

title: Love it
comment: Super bright screen, smooth scrolling. Shipping came 2 days earlier, yay!

title: Average
comment: Battery ok, camera meh. For the price it's fine but nothing amazzing.

title: Good but noisy
comment: Fan makes a whirring nois but overall it does the job.
